work.name: University of Alabama Birmingham
work.summary: Biomedical/clinical NLP research with Prof. John Osborne

Developing synthetic data generation package for bio-clinical IE
Investigated evaluation of social bias in multimodal models
Developing interpretable debiasing with Sparse Autoencoders (under review)
Studied SAE features for LLM/multimodal classifiers (under review)
Contributed to LitCoin competition team (hyperparameter tuning, NER architectures)
Constructed 40M-edge knowledge graph from PubMed abstracts for GNN-based drug repurposing
